mapper.select: SELECT d.seq_diagnosis as seqDiagnosis, a.animal_name as animalName, d.diagnosis_symptom as diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name as animalHospitalName, DATE_FORMAT(d.diagnosis_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as diagnosisDate FROM diagnosis as d JOIN animal as a ON d.seq_protector = a.seq_protector JOIN animalhospital as ah ON ah.seq_animal_hospital = d.seq_animal_hospital WHERE d.seq_protector = 1 ORDER BY d.diagnosis_date desc
